ComicInfo.Title: Mouth Trap; Another Mysterious Tree; Camp Vicki; Death, God, and the Devil Are One
ComicInfo.Summary:
Mouth Trap: A flashback story taking place in Fritz and Petra's childhood. Maria goes out to eat and doesn't come back for a few days, leaving her daughters by themselves in their squalid apartment.
Another Mysterious Tree: A flashback taking place in 1927. In Chicago, a tied-up Gorgo frees himself and kills all four gangsters who were threatening his and his father's life. Back in Palomar for rest, Gorgo has a prediction about Palomar's future which he reveals to a tree in a cryptic interaction. A tree that tests him by revealing its true face to him, perhaps the true face of a higher power.
Camp Vicki: Maggie finally gets out of Chester Square by taking a cab. She goes to her Aunt Vicki's wrestling camp and hangs out with cousin Xochitl and her best friend Gina. Interspersed with flashback scenes to Vicki and Rena Titañon's wrestling career from the time they started their tag team partnership to Vicki's defeat of her for the World Championship title.
Death, God, and the Devil Are One: Muerta is thwarted from claiming the young Errata's life because he can't get in until he counts all the bristles of a broom lying against the front door of her home.
